DOC.brief_summary: to determine the effectivness of intravitreal avastin injection on visual acuity on people that suffer from central retinal vein occlusion
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Intravitreal Avastin Injection for CRVO
DOC.criteria: patients above 18 years old suffer from CRVO maximal visual acuity 6/15 VA of LP retinal disease other than CRVO incomplete medical record follow up less than 6 months
